refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the latest job sent to Scilab engine

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This fonction returns the latest job sent to Scilab engine with the command SendScilabJob or SendScilabJobs. This can be used to display a command which failed.
BOOL is just a simple typedef on int (typedef int BOOL). TRUE is defined on 1 (#define TRUE 1) and FALSE is defined on 0 (#define FALSE 0).

listitem.para: a standard C char* which will be filled with the latest job
The number of char of JOB
0 (FALSE) if an error during initialization occured.
